definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: The series equipment is used in production of polyester bottle-packing carbonate drink.
sentences.chinese: 本系列設備用於聚脂瓶含氣飲料的生產。

sentences.english: Mainly apply to shrinking label film on polyester bottle.
sentences.chinese: 主要適用於聚脂塑料瓶標籤膜的收縮包裝。

sentences.english: Right now, I'm lying on polyester.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我卻是躺在聚脂纖維上。

sentences.english: The series equipment is used in producing all kind of soda drink contained with polyester bottle.
sentences.chinese: 本系列設備用於聚脂瓶裝各種碳酸飲料的生產。

sentences.english: Fiberball is a new type of filter material made of polyster fiber.
sentences.chinese: 纖維球是一種用聚脂纖維製成的新型球狀濾料。
以聚脂膜爲基材，塗上壓敏膠。

sentences.english: Mainly used as polyester catalytic in the synthetic fiber industry.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於合成纖維工業作聚脂縮聚催化劑。

sentences.english: This then taints their view of all polymer sealants unfairly .
sentences.chinese: 於是他們覺得聚脂密封劑不好。

sentences.english: The enclosure is pressed with glass fiber toughened unsaturated polyester.
sentences.chinese: 外殼採用玻璃纖維增強不飽和聚脂壓制而成。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
